name: deviceManagement_UpdateUserExperienceAnalyticsBaselines
description: Update the navigation property userExperienceAnalyticsBaselines in deviceManagement

$block: The user experience analytics baseline entity contains baseline values against which to compare the user experience analytics scores.

$ul: **id**: The unique identifier for an entity. Read-only.
**appHealthMetrics**: The user experience analytics app health metrics.
**batteryHealthMetrics**: The user experience analytics battery health metrics.
**bestPracticesMetrics**: The user experience analytics best practices metrics.
**createdDateTime**: The date the custom baseline was created.
**deviceBootPerformanceMetrics**: The user experience analytics device boot performance metrics.
**displayName**: The name of the user experience analytics baseline.
**isBuiltIn**: Signifies if the current baseline is the commercial median baseline or a custom baseline.
**rebootAnalyticsMetrics**: The user experience analytics reboot analytics metrics.
**resourcePerformanceMetrics**: The user experience analytics resource performance metrics.
**workFromAnywhereMetrics**: The user experience analytics work from anywhere metrics.
**client-request-id**: Client request Id as sent by the client application.
**request-id**: Request Id as tracked internally by the service
**client-request-id**: Client request Id as sent by the client application.
**request-id**: Request Id as tracked internally by the service
